name: ServiceNow-CICD-TestSuite-Run
description: Start a specified automated test suite.
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: testSuiteSysId
inputs.label: Test suite sys_id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if test_suite_name is not specified. The sys_id of the test suite to run. This value is located in the Test [sys_atf_test_suite] table.

inputs.name: testSuiteName
inputs.label: Test suite name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if test_suite_sys_id is not specified. The name of the test suite to run. This value is located in the Test [sys_atf_test_suite] table.

inputs.name: browserName
inputs.label: Browser name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the browser to use to run the client test. This value must match what is specified in the scheduled client test runner.

inputs.name: browserVersion
inputs.label: Browser version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Starting value of the version of the browser specified in browser_name to use to run the test. For example, if you enter "9", that would enable all 9.x.x.x versions. This value must match what is specified in the scheduled client test runner.

inputs.name: osName
inputs.label: OS name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the operating system under which to run the test suite. This value must match what is specified in the scheduled client test runner.

inputs.name: osVersion
inputs.label: OS version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Starting value of the version of the operating system under which to run the test suite. For example, if you enter "8", that would enable all 8.x.x.x versions. This value must match what is specified in the scheduled client test runner.
